A

Application - Class in fr.umlv.zen5
Main class of the Zen 4 framework.
ApplicationContext - Interface in fr.umlv.zen5
Provided by the application framework, this object allows to render a graphic code into the drawing area of the application and to wait/ask for a pointer event.

E

Event - Class in fr.umlv.zen5
An event ; a pointer event or a keyboard event ; an action and its set of modifiers.
Event.Action - Enum in fr.umlv.zen5
Action of the event.
Event.Modifier - Enum in fr.umlv.zen5
A event modifier.
exit(int) - Method in interface fr.umlv.zen5.ApplicationContext
Exit the application.

F

fr.umlv.zen5 - package fr.umlv.zen5
 

G

getAction() - Method in class fr.umlv.zen5.Event
Returns the action of the current event.
getHeight() - Method in interface fr.umlv.zen5.ScreenInfo
returns height of the application screen.
getKey() - Method in class fr.umlv.zen5.Event
Returns the keyboard key.
getLocation() - Method in class fr.umlv.zen5.Event
Returns the location of the pointer on the screen.
getModifiers() - Method in class fr.umlv.zen5.Event
A set of modifier keys that can contain Event.Modifier.META, Event.Modifier.CTRL, Event.Modifier.ALT, Event.Modifier.SHIFT and/or Event.Modifier.ALT_GR.
getScreenInfo() - Method in interface fr.umlv.zen5.ApplicationContext
Returns screen information.
getWidth() - Method in interface fr.umlv.zen5.ScreenInfo
returns width of the application screen.

K

KeyboardKey - Enum in fr.umlv.zen5
A keyboard key.

P

pollEvent() - Method in interface fr.umlv.zen5.ApplicationContext
Returns the first event since either the application was started or ApplicationContext.pollEvent()/ApplicationContext.pollOrWaitEvent(long) was called.
pollOrWaitEvent(long) - Method in interface fr.umlv.zen5.ApplicationContext
Returns the first event since either the application was started or ApplicationContext.pollEvent()/ApplicationContext.pollOrWaitEvent(long) was called.

R

renderFrame(Consumer<Graphics2D>) - Method in interface fr.umlv.zen5.ApplicationContext
Render a whole frame of the game in one call.
run(Color, Consumer<ApplicationContext>) - Static method in class fr.umlv.zen5.Application
Starts a GUI frame with a drawing area then runs the application code.
